tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE library_inventory (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE library_inventory (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_title VARCHAR(255),
  author_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE loan_transactions (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_id INT,
  borrower_name VARCHAR(255),
  loan_date DATE,
  return_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES library_inventory(book_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    published_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    book_id INT REFERENCES Books(book_id),
    loan_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    year_published INT
)

CREATE TABLE members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    loan_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE libraries (
    library_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    librarian_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE library_books (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  published_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE library_patrons (
  patron_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE library_loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patron_id INT,
  book_id INT,
  loan_date DATE,
  return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE library_loan_history (
  loan_id INT,
  patron_id INT,
  book_id INT,
  loan_date DATE,
  return_date DATE,
  returned BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE library_staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)
